name: Collect Good Fruits and Special Fruits, Dodge Bad Fruits
name_original: Collect Good Fruits and Special Fruits, Dodge Bad Fruits
description:
Collect as many fruits as you can while avoiding the dreaded dragon fruit! 

Use the arrow keys to jump and run. Double tap the arrow keys to dash. The special fruit, the eggplant will give you extra lives while the dragon fruit will take lives away.

Disclaimer: dragon fruits are perfectly good fruits
